rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg001
rows.name:
Hahaha, excellent!
What a spectacle!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg002
rows.name: Hey, look here!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg003
rows.name:
This one's a military transport vessel...
and that is what we'd call a destroyer!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg004
rows.name:
You look like you're enjoying yourself,
Newt.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg005
rows.name: You look like you're havin' fun, Newt.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg006
rows.name:
You seem to be enjoying yourself,
Newt.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg007
rows.name: Having fun, eh, Newt?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg008
rows.name: Well, duh!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg009
rows.name:
The latest and greatest warships of
the Superbian navy, all in one place!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg010
rows.name: Who wouldn't get excited?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg011
rows.name: Aaah! Look over there!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg012
rows.name:
That one being refitted is the newest
model of amphibious assault ship!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg013
rows.name:
It's the flagship of Division One of the
Second Imperial Guard, you know!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg014
rows.name: What should I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg015
rows.name:
Wow, Newt, you really like
your battleships, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg016
rows.name:
Wow, Newt, you really like
the Superbian army, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg017
rows.name: What should I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg018
rows.name: Newt, you sure do like battleships, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg019
rows.name:
Newt, you sure do like Superbian
military stuff, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg020
rows.name: What should I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg021
rows.name:
My word, Newt, you really do like
battleships, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg022
rows.name:
My word, Newt, you really do like
the Superbian military, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg023
rows.name: What should I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg024
rows.name:
Newt, you seriously like
battleships, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg025
rows.name:
Newt, you seriously are an
Superbian army buff, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg026
rows.name: No, you're totally off-base!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg027
rows.name:
Huh?
...I am?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg028
rows.name:
Eh?
...Off-base?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg029
rows.name: How do you mean?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg030
rows.name: Off-base? Me?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg031
rows.name:
Well, the terms are often incorrectly
conflated...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg032
rows.name:
A "battleship" is actually the name of
just one class of military vessel.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg033
rows.name:
When speaking more generally,
the correct term is "warship" or
"combat vessel".

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg034
rows.name:
There are many subcategories, like
destroyers, escort vessels, cruisers
or battleships...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg035
rows.name:
And of course we can't forget transport
vessels and other specialized craft...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg036
rows.name:
Then you can divide them by specific
duty, or by the size of the Divine Beast they
incorporate, or by their capabilities...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg038
rows.name: Okay, I get it!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg039
rows.name:
I don't think I'll remember any of that
if you rattle it off so quickly...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg040
rows.name: Okay, okay, okay!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg041
rows.name:
Nobody'll get anything from a lecture
like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg042
rows.name: Enough!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg043
rows.name:
Ah, sorry. Didn't mean to shout. That
wasn't very professional of me.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg044
rows.name: Enough, already...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg045
rows.name:
I've got it now, so please just
wind down a bit?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg046
rows.name:
Oh, really? I was only just getting to
the really cool part, but okay...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg047
rows.name:
Well, I guess I'll tell you the rest later
at some point!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg048
rows.name: Whoa!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg049
rows.name:
That ship's been specifically made for
the Imperial Guard! I cannot believe it's
here!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg050
rows.name: Come on, Driver-person! Let's dash!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg052
rows.name: Well, obviously!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg053
rows.name:
The Superbian Armed Forces are the
finest army in the world!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg054
rows.name:
Unlike other countries, in Superbia
the state controls the army directly...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg055
rows.name:
putting a lot of effort into R&D based
around applying ancient technology...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg056
rows.name:
to create the world's most modern and
technologically advanced military force!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg057
rows.name:
And by the way, the Invidian military
uses mercenary forces mostly, so...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg058
rows.name:
each town's training and equipment can
differ, making the units hard to balance!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg059
rows.name:
Superbia have a ton of elite officers
to lead their forces, too - not least the
mighty Flamebringer, of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg061
rows.name: Okay, okay, I get the picture!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg062
rows.name:
I don't think I'd ever be able to
remember all that...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg063
rows.name: Fine, I get it! You can stop now.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg064
rows.name:
I appreciate the effort, but that's all
in one ear, right out the other...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg065
rows.name:
I'm sorry, that's enough.
I think I got the gist, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg066
rows.name: Enough, enough already!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg067
rows.name:
You're talking my ear off
with all this nonsense...

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg068
rows.name:
Aw, come on, there's tons more
I've got to talk about!

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg069
rows.name:
I know! How about I tell you stories
about all the commanding officers?

rows.label: kizunatalk070_msg070
rows.name:
We'll be here till morning, so
get comfortable!
